variable.name: SUBJID
variable.comment: Deidentified ID where the first two digits denote the origination site of the samples; site key: Marshfield Clinic=16; Vanderbilt University=27; Group Health Cooperative=38; Mayo Clinic=49; Northwestern University=52

variable.name: ICD9_CODE
variable.description: Presence of ICD 9 code(s) or any associated subcodes in record for four code categories: 250, 272, 401, 724
variable.value: Other and unspecified disorders of back

variable.name: COUNTS_ICD9_CODE
variable.description: Number of unique instances of this ICD9 code in the individual, truncated at 4 distinct instances.
variable.comment: 250=Diabetes mellitus; 272=Disorders of lipoid metabolism; 401=Essential hypertension; 724=Other and unspecified disorders of back. Variable's summary report not shown here.
